verbs.description: After [ARG0: Ivanka Trump] [V: attended] [ARG1: the Team USA Awards] [ARGM-MNR: in a frilly black - and - white number from Alexis] and buckled heels , one troll said the shoes were more appropriate to Thanksgiving .
